subject: Re: [junit] send string containing lexical representation of xsd:base64Binary as parameter
msgSnippet: ... Your problem appears to have nothing to do with JUnit, so maybe this isn t the best place to ask. Perhaps you should ask in an XML-related mailing list. --
messageBody:
kavitha arumugam wrote:

> I have came cross one problem. How to resolve
> solution. Any one knows about the followings.
>
> 1.What is meant by "A string containing lexical
> representation of xsd:base64Binary".
> 2 to send string containing lexical representation of
> xsd:base64Binary as parameter.How can we achieve
> this??

Your problem appears to have nothing to do with JUnit, so maybe this
isn't the best place to ask. Perhaps you should ask in an XML-related
mailing list.
--
